item.title: Dynamic DNS and DHCP - Easy to do, and you'll thank yourself later
item.description: Preface This article will cover how to setup dns with dynamic updates aswell as configuring your dhcp server to push updates to it aswell. I assume you already know how to setup plain old dns aswell as plain old dhcp. This is not an introduction to either of those. I used BIND 9 and ISC DHCPD v3 for this article. If there’s anything this article doesn’t cover with respect to what you are looking for, leave a comment and I’ll do what I can.
